src:
Daily Lotto: One lucky winner on Monday

04 Nov 2019, 21:46

One player bagged the Daily Lotto prize in Monday's draw.
Here are the results for Monday night's daily lotto draw. 



In case you missed it, here are the winning Lotto and Lotto Plus numbers from the Saturday, November 2 draw:
Lotto:  02, 04, 13, 20, 33, 46 Bonus: 27
Lotto Plus 1: 04, 08, 15, 19, 28, 44 Bonus: 03
Lotto Plus 2: 03, 06, 28, 43, 45, 51 Bonus: 25
Are you feeling lucky? See the payouts for the Lotto here, click here for Lotto Plus 1 and Lotto Plus 2, click here.
Download the News24 app via the Play or iTunes App stores and get a free alert moments after each Lotto draw with the winning numbers.

Tap 
here to download the News24 Android App
 or 
here to download the News24 Apple App
.
